items.title: Oppo starts teasing the K14x in India
items.summary: Oppo has started teasing a new K-series device that's coming soon to the Indian market, by releasing the image you can see below. The phone will be sold by Flipkart, and the retailer's URL for its teaser reveals that the handset in question is actually the K14x. This will pretty obviously be the suâ€¦

items.title: RAM prices show signs of levelling out, albeit at inflated levels â€” some modules stabilizing in price, increases on higher-end kits tapering off
items.summary: Pricing trends show a slowing or tapering off of memory pricing, but some high-end DDR5 kits still show continued increases.

items.title: Bayern legend? How Kane is viewed in Germany as contract talks begin
items.summary: Harry Kane is entering the final 18 months of his Bayern Munich contract, and the German champions are eager to keep the prolific striker, as German football writer Constantin Eckner explains.

items.title: Teslaâ€™s robotaxis are cheaper than Waymo, but the wait times are longer
items.summary: Tesla's robotaxis are not robotaxis in the sense that they're not fully driverless and still feature safety monitors with access to a kill switch in case anything goes wrong. But the automaker is shaking things up with its approach to pricing, according to a new analysis of the nascent market. Obi,â€¦

items.title: Yahoo Scout looks like a more web-friendly take on AI search
items.summary: Yahoo's big AI play is, in many ways, actually a return to the company's roots. Three decades ago, Yahoo was known as "Jerry's guide to the world wide web," and was designed as a sort of all-encompassing portal to help people find good stuff on an increasingly large, hard-to-parse internet. In the â€¦

items.title: Moto G17 leaks in renders showing three colors
items.summary: Yesterday the upcoming Moto G17 had its memory and storage amounts leaked, and it was confirmed to be on the way by Motorola's own website. Today some leaked renders show us the G17 in three colors: Alaskan Blue, Evening Blue, and pink. Moto G17 in Alaskan Blue The G17 allegedly measures 165.67 x 7â€¦

items.title: Alcaraz dominates De Minaur to reach last four
items.summary: Carlos Alcaraz continues his quest to become the youngest ever man to complete the career Grand Slam with a dominant straight-sets win against home hero Alex de Minaur in their Australian Open quarter-final.

items.title: Guardiola apologises to ref Hallam but 'defends' outburst
items.summary: Pep Guardiola has apologised to new Premier League referee Farai Hallam if he "feels offended", having taken issue with the official following Manchester City's victory over Wolves on Saturday. But the Spaniard said he has to "defend my club and my players".

items.title: Coutinho advice & Adriano comparison - Bournemouth's new Brazilian teen
items.summary: Bournemouth have made 19-year-old Brazilian forward Rayan their second most-expensive signing. Who is he and how good can he be?

items.title: Amazon will pay customers $309 million to settle ‘no hassle returns’ lawsuit
items.summary: Amazon is resolving claims that it incorrectly processed returns with a proposed settlement valued at over $1 billion, as reported earlier by Reuters and Bloomberg Law. The settlement includes $600 million in refunds, along with an additional $309.5 million in payments to affected customers. Initiaâ€¦

items.title: Nothing's flagship India store will open on February 14
items.summary: Nothing has revealed the date for its first flagship store in India. Located in the South Indian city of Bengaluru, the store will open on Saturday, February 14. The company first announced plans for its store opening a couple of weeks ago. The India store will be Nothing's second flagship store, aâ€¦

items.title: Alcaraz storms past De Minaur into semi-finals
items.summary: Carlos Alcaraz continues his quest to become the youngest man to complete the career Grand Slam as he charges past Alex de Minaur in the quarter-finals.

items.title: Dev creates astrology-powered CPU scheduler for Linux, makes decisions based on planetary positions and zodiac signs â€” sched_ext framework informed by lunar phases, cosmic weather reports, and dynamic time slicing
items.summary: A software engineer has developed a fully functional Linux scheduler that takes its cues from the popular pseudoscience of astrology.

items.title: Luiz agrees Villa return on loan
items.summary: Aston Villa agree a deal to re-sign former midfielder Douglas Luiz on loan as Unai Emery looks to bolster his options in the centre of the pitch.

items.title: Glentoran-Coleraine semi-final postponed due to storm damage
items.summary: The BetMcLean Cup semi-final between Glentoran and Coleraine at the Oval is postponed due to damage and flooding caused by Storm Chandra.

items.title: SSD price tracking 2026: Lowest price on every M.2 SSD from Samsung, Western Digital, Crucial, and more â€” here are the best deals during the AI-driven pricing crisis
items.summary: Updated twice daily, this list shows the lowest US prices on major SSD models.

items.title: SAMA L70 Review: Competitive performance that punches above its price tag
items.summary: Can a $70 AIO compete with the best coolers on the market? Weâ€™ve tested SAMAâ€™s L70 with AMDâ€™s Ryzen 9 9950X CPU, and the results surprised us.

items.title: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger
items.summary: The US federal agency says it will not play an immigration role at February's event in Milan-Cortina.

items.title: In Pictures: Sporting photos of the week
items.summary: A selection of some of the most striking sports photographs taken around the world over the past seven days.

items.title: Gauff calls for more player privacy after racquet smash
items.summary: Coco Gauff calls for more privacy for players after she was filmed smashing a racquet after a devastating defeat by Elina Svitolina in the Australian Open quarter-finals.

items.title: 'We're there for him' - England will rally around grieving Itoje
items.summary: Club and country team-mate Jamie George says England will rally around captain Maro Itoje as he grieves the death of his mother.

items.title: Newegg stock price falls 17.7% after Chinese owner is detained by anti-corruption authorities â€” company insists itâ€™s operating normally and â€˜in accordance with the lawsâ€™
items.summary: Various law firms are calling out to Newegg investors for a potential class action lawsuit as the company's stock price fell by 17.7% after the chairperson of its majority stockholder was detained on suspicion of corruption.

items.title: iPhone 5s and iPhone 6 are receiving a new iOS update
items.summary: Apple recently rolled out the iOS 26.2.1 and iPadOS 26.2.1 updates for its latest devices. However, the company also pushed a surprise update to several older models, including the 13-year-old iPhone 5s and the 12-year-old iPhone 6. iOS 12.5.8 and iPadOS 12.5.8 have been rolled out by Apple for sevâ€¦

items.title: Save $700 on Samsung's award-winning ultrawide Odyssey G9 gaming monitor â€” a QD-OLED panel and dual QHD resolution gives you two monitors in one
items.summary: Two Samsung ultrawide gaming and productivity screens are on sale at different price points, but at all-time low pricing.

items.title: What's behind the Irish impact in the NFL?
items.summary: BBC Sport NI looks at the growing Irish impact in the NFL and the next batch of players hoping to secure a career in American football.

items.title: Intel enables XeSS 3 Multi-Frame Generation in latest drivers, expanding frame generation across Arc GPUs and Core Ultra iGPUs â€” MFG can be enabled across any title with XeSS 2 support
items.summary: The latest Intel graphics drivers introduce XeSS 3 Multi-Frame Generation with 2x, 3x, and 4x modes, supporting existing XeSS 2 games without requiring developer updates

items.title: Clever Brit successfully repurposes telephone wiring for gigabit internet throughout his vintage home â€” Lad converts "incomprehensible mess of wires" into high-speed ethernet links
items.summary: Tired of slow, laggy internet throughout your house and don't want to deal with cables dangling outside? The solution could be simpler than you think, repurposing existing cables inside your walls to achieve fast internet everywhere in the home. That's what an Englishman has just done, and it's betâ€¦

items.title: Man Utd's Dorgu set for weeks out with hamstring issue
items.summary: In-form Patrick Dorgu is still being assessed but he is likely to miss Manchester United matches with the injury he picked up against Arsenal.

items.title: Nothing Phone (4a) Pro battery and charging details emerge in latest certification
items.summary: Nothing's Phone 4a series is set to launch soon and ahead of its unveiling, the Phone 4a Pro emerged in a certification listing on the EUâ€™s EPREL database. The device appeared with the same A069P model number as previous listings, and we get confirmation of its 5,080mAh battery with 50W charging. Nâ€¦

items.title: First Hundred auction to span two days in March
items.summary: The Hundred's inaugural player auction will be held in London on 11 and 12 March, in a historic first for major sport in the UK.

items.title: Brighton women's coach Rado Vidosic dies aged 64
items.summary: Rado Vidosic, Brighton's women's and girls' head of coaching and father of women's head coach Dario, dies aged 64.

items.title: Wales call Wainwright as Assiratti to miss Six Nations
items.summary: Wales prop Keiron Assiratti is set to miss the Six Nations after suffering a calf injury with fellow Cardiff prop Sam Wainwright called into the squad.

items.title: Lions tour provides spark for Jones after World Cup peak
items.summary: England centre Meg Jones targets the first women's Lions tour in 2027 and back-to-back World Cups in 2029 as she sets new rugby goals.

items.title: DoomBuds ports the 1993 FPS classic to open-source earbuds by streaming JPGs at 18fps â€” runs on 300MHz CPU with less than 1MB of RAM
items.summary: A developer has ported Doom to a pair of earbuds, but there were extra hurdles to jump, as the earbuds don't have a screen.

items.title: Carrick needs to be judged over a longer period - Sutton
items.summary: Mark Chapman is joined by Chris Sutton on The Monday Night Club as the former Premier League striker praises Michael Carrick after his "brilliant start" as interim head coach of Manchester United.

items.title: Huawei nova 14i debuts in Hong Kong
items.summary: Following its announcement over three months ago, Huaweiâ€™s nova 14i has made its way to Hong Kong and we finally have pricing details to go with it. The device will be available from February 6 and will retail for HKD 1,588 ($203) in its 8/256GB storage trim. Nova 14i is available in blue and blackâ€¦

items.title: Palace could get dragged into this - Sutton
items.summary: Chris Sutton tells the Monday Night Club that he believes Crystal Palace could be dragged into a relegation battle in the Premier League if they don't make a decision on manager Oliver Glasner soon.

items.title: Briton Hennessy to headline on BBC Two
items.summary: Francesca Hennessyworld-title eliminator against Ellie Bouttell will headline at London's Copper Box Arena on Saturday, live on BBC Two and BBC iPlayer.

items.title: Wales to face Barbarians in Twickenham double-header in June
items.summary: Wales men and women will face the Barbarians in a double-header at Allianz Stadium in Twickenham in June.
